1.title: Rebirth (Redux)
1.plot: The Tulip emerges from hyperspace after 15 years with Percy aboard. Dante is lost somewhere in time, but his son Travis, now a grown man, has taken up the bounty hunting profession and is assisted by his friend Marcus Fagen.

2.title: Star Crossed (Redux)
2.plot: It is the year 2300. Bounty hunter Travis Montana, his female cousin Percy and misfit crew patrol the galaxy hunting criminals. Travis searches for his lost father Dante while investigating the secrets of the mysterious Divinity Cluster.

3.title: Biocrime (Redux)
3.plot: Down on Io's Syn City, Marcus comes to the aid of a prostitute friend named Taryn who is being mutated by a genetic alteration. Marcus learns a geneticist known as "Father Abode" is in the business of made-to-order sex slaves.

4.title: Chasing Janus (Redux)
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Spaceman (Redux)
5.plot: The crew picks up a life pod with a man called Mishkin, a military experiment. He knows he is dangerous and put himself in the pod. Military has come to "retrieve" him. While the crew are each dealing with their own inner demons.

6.title: Becoming Shiva (Redux)
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: The Third Thing (Redux)
7.plot: A fallow season for both the bounty hunters and the crew of a Holovision series bring both parties together with disastrous results.

8.title: Torment (Redux)
8.plot: Tis adventure turns into a family affair as Travis and team are hired to rescue a man's kidnapped parents, evoking memories of Travis's own lost father, and Rudolpho comes face to face with the teenaged daughter he hasn't seen in years.

9.title: Painless (Redux)
9.plot: A powerful narcotics broker dealing the latest recreational drug has people dying daily on Saturn Federation, and Travis is hired to bring in the drug lord.

10.title: Skin Deep (Redux)
10.plot: Travis is smitten with Callie's old friend, the beautiful Lena Bannen who visits the Tulip and who, with a big secret to hide, keeps bounty hunters hot on the trail of the ship and its crew.

11.title: Supermax Redux (Redux)
11.plot: En route to dropping off a bounty, Travis and his crew encounter an old nemesis who offers to share the riches from a cache of precious stones rarer than diamonds.

12.title: Pandora's Box (Redux)
12.plot: The Tulip encounters a formidable foe that, after destroying planets in the Far Worlds, is determined to wreak havoc on the inner reaches of the solar system.

13.title: A Stitch in Time (Redux)
13.plot: As the Tulip transports a prisoner back to Jupiter, the ship and its inhabitants come to the rescue of an orbital mining platform being rocked by waves of gravitational turbulence.

14.title: The Prisoner (Redux)
14.plot: As Tulip transports Jane Doe, psych patient suffering from amnesia, to Ganeymede Correctional facility, nefarious Orchard makes a reappearance, intent on tracking down those who possess unusual powers as a result of the Divinity Cluster.

15.title: Kate (Redux)
15.plot: Percy, disgruntled with Carravagio's chauvinism, decides to create an AI that emulates the more "feminie" traits of emotion and intuition, but "Kate" is not exactly what she had in mind.

16.title: Rivals (Redux)
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: The Heir and the Spare (Redux)
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Just Politics (Redux)
18.plot: Travis and crew are transporting a government official to the Manheim Asteroid Belt to close a trade deal, but the assignment is not what it seems and the bureaucrat is not whom he appears to be.

19.title: Negative Energy (Redux)
19.plot: In the interest of offering improved bounty-hunting services, our crew goes in search of alternative fuel for their anti-matter drive, deciding it's time to put the module to the test.

20.title: License to Fill (Redux)
20.plot:
Know what this is about?

21.title: Hyperspace I (Redux)
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: Hyperspace II (Redux)
22.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Divinity Cluster (Redux)
1.plot: Dante is reunited with McDuff, an old friend who's dying of cancer. Meanwhile, Lucretia's father Darius Scott asks her to capture unstable geneticist Eccleston, who holds the secret to an alien gene known as The Divinity Cluster.

2.title: Trust
2.plot: Percy ignores the warnings of both Dante and Lucretia when she decides to befriend one of a pair of cousins that the crew of the Tulip are transporting to an automated prison on Mercury.

3.title: Family Values (Redux)
3.plot: Dante and Lucretia encounter a Raider with a boy who might be Dante's missing son while hunting con artists on Mars. Back on the Tulip Percy gets trapped in Dante's virtual reality device that simulates his dead wife Penny.

4.title: Siren's Song (Redux)
4.plot: Dante and Lucretia capture Petrakis, vicious escaped prisoner who hijacked a luxury yacht. However, Tulip gets commandeered by Special Ops squad transporting Ire, young girl with unique powers who might be infected with a deadly virus.

5.title: The Man Who Sold the World (Redux)
5.plot: Dante and Lucretia try to capture Novak, ruthless war criminal responsible for sacrificing thousands of innocents to the Divinity Cluster. Percy and Caravaggio contend with Billy Ray, holographic computer virus wreaking havoc on the Tulip.

6.title: Peer Pressure
6.plot: Dante arrests murderess Dr. Nasreen and her browbeaten teenage son Ajit. Unbeknownst to Dante, Nasreen possesses a device that can control his mind.

7.title: Frozen (Redux)
7.plot: While transporting con artist Etienne to prison, the Tulip receives a distress call from Dr. Devon. It turns out Devon is being pursued by a band of Raiders after freeing his psychically gifted son Ryan from Orchard research facility.

8.title: Past Lives (Redux)
8.plot: Rudolpho instructs Tulip crew to pick up a murder suspect who turns out to be Lucretia's ex-husband Eric, escaped from Orchard medical facility after injection with experimental antibody that killed all prior recipients within 48 hours.

9.title: Order
9.plot: The crew of the Tulip receive a radio transmission from a religious cult planning to commit mass suicide by crashing their ship into the sun. Lucretia winds up falling under the unnatural influence of charismatic cult leader Brother #13.

10.title: Cell Game (Redux)
10.plot: Percy gets arrested after she assaults a bounty hunter who's a member of the rival group the Oberen Militia. Oberen Militia leader Rex uses Percy's arrest to blackmail Dante into freeing her brother Goran from a Neried prison.

11.title: Black Light (Redux)
11.plot: Colonel E.W. Bramwell wakes after 50 years in cryogenic slumber. However, Bramwell still believes that Earth is at war with the Raiders. Dante plans to use Bramwell's legendary status with the Raiders as a means to find his son Travis.

12.title: Goodbye So Long (Redux)
12.plot: Dante is reunited with Ike, old friend who was a rival for Penny's affections. Ike's shady business partner Marco works with Raiders to locate special seeds that can grow in any climate. Percy suspects that Lucretia has a hidden agenda.

13.title: The Most Wanted Man (Redux)
13.plot: Harman, former associate of Darius Scott, becomes one of the most wanted men in the universe after he develops superhuman speed and refuses to talk to anyone but Darius. Dante's and Percy's suspicions about Lucretia come to a head.

14.title: Half Dense Players
14.plot: Darius pulls strings with Rudolpho to have the Tulip transport Andrea Arquette, an artist who's suspected of murder. Percy discovers that the Tulip is being trailed by a cloaked ship that might be over three million years old.

15.title: Dark and Stormy Night (Redux)
15.plot: Darius boards the Tulip to help Lucretia inform Dante about the Divinity Cluster.

16.title: Super Max (Redux)
16.plot: After Rudolpho sells the Tulip to weaselly businessman Max for conversion into a prison ship, Dante must infiltrate Max's organization while fending off the unwanted advances of Max's amorous wife Zelda.

17.title: A Twist in Time (Redux)
17.plot: The Tulip is diverted to search for survivors after an accident at a secret research station on Triton. When it gets disabled by the station's graviton experiment, Dante stumbles on a time loop that gives him multiple chances to save Percy.

18.title: Eat Sin (Redux)
18.plot: Dante, Lucretia, and Percy are caught in separate Bubble Universes due to graviton experiment on a Triton research station gone haywire. Each has to outwit different versions of Five, insane serial killer prisoner on board the Tulip.

19.title: Bad Girls (Redux)
19.plot: Dante agrees to transport Rudolpho's friend Stephen Hamilton and his two daughters Ayla and Cordula. However, Dante is unaware that Hamilton is being blackmailed by the Orchard to spy on him.

20.title: Bad Seed (Redux)
20.plot: Dante is kidnapped by ruthless Orchard agent Tosca, who believes Dante's missing son Travis holds the key to The Divinity Cluster. Percy has her hands full as she tries to stop an evil version of Caravaggio from blowing up the Tulip.

21.title: Travis (Redux)
21.plot: The Tulip receives a cryptic message from Percy that leads Dante to the special seeds concealed in her quarters. Dante is reunited with his son Travis, who reveals his mother Penny's role in early experiments with The Divinity Cluster.

22.title: Resurrection (Redux)
22.plot: Tension and mistrust mounts among the crew members of the Tulip with the addition of Dante's son Travis as a reluctant new member. Moreover, Eccleston returns from "the dead" with a dire warning about The Divinity Cluster.

locations: Toronto, Ontario, Canada::(Back-shooting for eps 201 to 222)
imdb.plot outline: The story of the 44 episodes of Starhunter is revealed in 'Starhunter, Creator's Cut' as originally intended by the show Creators. Censored scenes restored, bold ideas returned, episodes re-edited to match original scripts, never seen before material, as Creators Dan D'or and Phil Jackson wanted, but were blocked the first time around.
imdb.title: Starhunter ReduX
plot: The story of the 44 episodes of Starhunter is revealed in 'Starhunter, Creator's Cut' as originally intended by the show Creators. Censored scenes restored, bold ideas returned, episodes re-edited to match original scripts, never seen before material, as Creators Dan D'or and Phil Jackson wanted, but were blocked the first time around.::Gregg Larson
synopsis:
Starhunter REDUX tells the story of a dysfunctional family of bounty hunters pursuing criminals on the off-world colonies of Earth 300 years into the future. The rule of law has broken down on this new frontier, leaving justice to dangerous men and women who offer their services for hire. Starhunter REDUX follows Dante Montana (Michael Pare) and his niece Percy (Tanya Allen) and their crew as they hunt criminals in deep space while searching for Dante's lost son (Clive Robertson) taken by outlaws long ago. Often tormented by their pasts, the crew, including Claudette Roche as Lucretia Scott, struggles as the universe changes around them in bewildering ways. It's a time when humans have spread across the solar system, colonizing planets and building new worlds. Rule of law has broken down on this new frontier, leaving justice in the hands of dangerous men and women who offer their services for hire.
The series follows bounty hunter Dante Montana and his crew, who hunt criminals in deep space while searching for Dante's lost son who was taken by a clan of outlaws years ago. The crew also struggle with their tormented pasts as the universe changes around them in ways yet to be understood.
Starhunter: REDUX is an updated, re-cut and re-scored 44 episodes of the hit cult classic science fiction series. It presents a creatively different edition of the series closer to the creators' original vision. It is also the precursor of the anticipated Starhunter Season III.
The original two seasons of Starhunter aired in Canada on Space: The Imagination Station and The Movie Network: Season 1 in 2000; Season 2 in 2003. Starhunter REDUX is not yet available in Canada. New episodes of Starhunter REDUX will premiere every Tuesday at 8PM ET only on the El Rey Network.
